short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that enables users to exclude their browser from Usermaven's tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension designed to allow users to opt-out of Usermaven's tracking. Prioritize only the website visits of significance.

Skip the hassle of repeatedly excluding your IP address every time your location changes. With Usermaven's Chrome extension, effortlessly prevent your browser from being tracked by Usermaven, irrespective of your location.

To ensure you're off Usermaven's radar, simply tap on the Usermaven icon in your extension panel and press the Power button. Following this, no events will be relayed from your browser to Usermaven.
